title: Make the Custom Carpets CTA image full-bleed with sharp edges

requirements.text: Update ONLY the selected image element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) in `frontend/src/components/sections/CustomCarpetsCtaSection.tsx` so it visually behaves like a cover image that stretches across the entire viewport width (no side margins) and has sharp (non-rounded) edges.

quotes: can you get rid of the margins and stretch it across the entire screen width like cover image. Also sharp edges.

acceptanceCriteria: On all breakpoints, the selected image renders edge-to-edge across the viewport width (no visible left/right margins around the image).
The selected image uses a cover-style fit (no distortion; cropped as needed).
The selected image has sharp corners (no rounding on the image itself).
No other elements besides the selected image element are modified.

constraints: Apply changes only to the selected element identified by the provided XPath; do not modify other DOM elements or components.
Do not modify files in `frontend/src/components/ui` or other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the section layout, text content, or spacing of other elements in the Custom Carpets section.
Do not add new images or modify existing image assets.
